text: Ngati atadza kwa iwe anthu amene amakhulupirira chivumbulutso chathu. Nena, “Mtendere ukhale pa inu.” Ambuye wanu adadzilamulira yekha kuti azionetsa chisoni kuti ngati wina wa inu achita choipa chifukwa chosadziwa ndipo alapa pambuyo pake ndipo achita ntchito zabwino, ndithudi Iye ndi wokhululukira ndi wachisoni chosatha
